main event: Three observers reported seeing a bright object with a green body and an orange trail in the sky.
interesting points: The object was much brighter than jet exhaust,The observation lasted between 3 to 5 seconds,The sighting was confirmed by military and civilian sources,All three observers had the same description of the object,The USAF Captain concluded it was a meteor.
sighted object: one bright object with a green body and an orange trail
